segments.text: Honey , I need to have a talk with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Dad , I have to do my homework .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , honey , why didn't you go to cram school last night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Dad , I don't want to talk about it now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Honey , if you don't want to go to cram school , you should tell me the reason why .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , dad . But I would rather stay at school than go to cram school .
segments.speaker: S2
